advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to read sensitive information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher working with Compartir

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing a malicious audio file may result in unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted PDF may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions. Apple was aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited at the time of release.
advisories.description: A deserialization issue was addressed through improved validation.

cves.credit: Citizen Lab and Google Project Zero

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A permissions issue existed. This issue was addressed with improved permission validation.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read arbitrary files as root
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to execute arbitrary files
advisories.description: A URI parsing issue was addressed with improved parsing.

advisories.impact: curl could potentially reveal sensitive internal information to the server using a clear-text network protocol
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted dfont file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.impact: A malicious application may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Jack Dates of RET2 Systems, Inc.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Ron Hass (@ronhass7) of Perception Point, Ron Waisberg (@epsilan)

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by updating expat to version 2.4.1.

advisories.impact: A person with access to a host Mac may be able to bypass the Login Window in Remote Desktop for a locked instance of macOS
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Benjamin Berger of BBetterTech LLC, Aaron Hines of AHDesigns916, Peter Goedtkindt of Informatique-MTF S.A.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to access restricted files
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) and Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

advisories.impact: A user may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyen Vu Hoang of STAR Labs

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak memory
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyen Vu Hoang of STAR Labs

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.
